cast.name: 阿拉斯泰尔·苏克 Alastair Sooke
雅尼娜·拉米雷斯 Janina Ramirez

writer.name: 阿拉斯泰尔·苏克 Alastair Sooke

trans_title: 艺术爱好者指南 第一季
introduction: With sumptuous palaces, exquisite artworks and stunning architecture, every great city offers a dizzying multitude of cultural highlights. So what should an art lover see on a flying visit?Art historians Dr Janina Ramirez and Alastair Sooke take us on three entertaining and revealing cultural city breaks, offering surprising new insights into famous locations and uncovering hidden gems and untold stories, as they discover how religion, revolution and trailblazing individuals can shape the art - and soul - of a city.
chinese_title: 艺术爱好者指南 第一季
